ENTER THE ARENA

Join the world's most competitive hackathon

Prepare for an innovation extravaganza at LNM Hacks! Dive into the 72-hour excitement of LNMHacks 8.0, where coding novices and seasoned pros come together for a transformative journey of building breakthrough solutions.

Journey Through LNMHACKS History

Explore the evolution of LNMHACKS over the years and see how we've grown into one of the premier hackathons.

HACKS 6.0

HACKS 6.0

LNMHACKS 6.0 marked our expansion into emerging technologies with a special focus on AR/VR and cloud computing. The event saw incredible innovation in immersive technologies.

🎯 120+ Projects Built
👨‍💻 600+ Developers Participated
🎪 Virtual + Hybrid Format
📱 First Mobile-First Hackathon
🎮 AR/VR Track Introduction

HACKS 7.0

HACKS 7.0

Our most successful hackathon yet! LNMHACKS 7.0 witnessed groundbreaking innovations across AI, Web3, and IoT domains with record-breaking participation from 800+ developers.

🏆 150+ Project Submissions
👥 800+ Participants from 50+ Colleges
💰 ₹5,00,000+ Prize Pool
🌟 30+ Industry Mentors
🚀 15+ Startup Ideas Incubated

HACKS 8.0

HACKS 8.0

The biggest and most ambitious edition yet! LNMHACKS 8.0 brings together 1000+ developers for 48 hours of innovation, featuring cutting-edge AI, cybersecurity challenges, and breakthrough technologies.

🎯 Current Edition - 2024
👨‍💻 1000+ Expected Participants
💎 ₹10,00,000+ Prize Pool
🔒 First CTF Integration
🌟 50+ Industry Partners

What Hackers Say About Us

Don't just take our word for it. Here's what previous participants have to say about their LNMHACKS experience.

Arjun Sharma

@arjundev

LNMHACKS 7.0 was life-changing! Built an AI-powered healthcare app in 48 hours and won the innovation track. The mentorship was incredible!

Priya Patel

@priyatech

From idea to prototype in 72 hours! LNMHACKS taught me that anything is possible with the right team and mindset. Amazing community!

Ravi Kumar

@ravicodes

Best hackathon experience ever! The energy at LNMIIT was electric. Made lifelong friends and launched my startup idea here.
